troubleshooting.title: Guide Not Responding
troubleshooting.shortdesc: Steps to take if your booked guidedoes not reply to messages or calls.

condition.title: Applies to all bookings within the app.
condition.p: Your guide has not replied within the expected time frame.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: The guide may be unavailable, facing technical issues, or not checking messages.

step.cmd: Send a polite reminder message through the app chat.
Check the guide's last active status on their profile.
If urgent, contact support to request an alternative guide.
Cancel the booking if no response is received and request a refund if applicable.
